name: NEO-RUN
description:
NEO-RUN is a 2 player, local multiplayer, looping runner game.  You are being chased down by an unknown figure as the path ahead changes. Survive by running, jumping and sliding for as long as you can. 

Made by cjbarron (https://cjbarron.itch.io/) in collaboration with:

https://ryan-higgins.itch.io/

https://supertigerface.itch.io/

https://rkplayer251.itch.io/
